level.text: The provisions in this Chapter shall apply exclusively to outdoor pay telephones unless otherwise specified.

The provisions in this Chapter do not apply to outdoor pay telephones installed and operated on federal military installations and federal military hospitals where access by the public is limited thereon.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 48 DCR 1151 (February 9, 2001); Final Rulemaking published at 49 DCR 531 (January 18, 2002).
